prompt_sent_to_api:
You are a senior clinical geneticist. Your task is to synthesize findings from the provided analytical tool reports into a single, ranked list of potential diagnoses.

Create a master list of all unique disease candidates from all reports. Then, rank them from most to least plausible based on the strength of the evidence (consensus across tools, high scores/ranks).

Your final output must be a numbered list. Each line should contain only the rank, disease name, and OMIM ID. Do not include any reasoning or other text.

**Example Output:**
1. DISEASE NAME 1 (OMIM:XXXXXX)
2. DISEASE NAME 2 (OMIM:YYYYYY)
3. DISEASE NAME 3 (OMIM:ZZZZZZ)

---
INPUT CONTEXT

II. Analytical Tool Reports

PubCaseFinder Report (Phenotype-based):
- osteopathia striata with cranial sclerosis (Score: 0.744)
- Cornelia de Lange syndrome 1 (Score: 0.739)
- Coffin-Siris syndrome 1 (Score: 0.729)
- chromosome 1p36 deletion syndrome (Score: 0.725)
- Rubinstein-Taybi syndrome due to CREBBP mutations (Score: 0.723)

Zero-Shot Diagnosis Report (Generative AI-based):
- KABUKI SYNDROME 2; KABUK2 (Rank: 1)
- NOONAN SYNDROME 12; NS12 (Rank: 2)
- CHARGE SYNDROME (Rank: 3)
- ROBINOW-SORAUF SYNDROME (Rank: 4)
- ALAGILLE SYNDROME 1; ALGS1 (Rank: 5)

GestaltMatcher Report (Facial Dysmorphology-based):
- Rubinstein-Taybi syndrome (Score: 0.498)
- WIEDEMANN-STEINER SYNDROME; WDSTS (Score: 0.491)
- KAUFMAN OCULOCEREBROFACIAL SYNDROME; KOS (Score: 0.487)
- OHDO SYNDROME, SBBYS VARIANT; SBBYSS (Score: 0.485)
- INTELLECTUAL DEVELOPMENTAL DISORDER WITH DYSMORPHIC FACIES AND PTOSIS; IDDDFP (Score: 0.485)

Phenotype Similarity Search Report (Vector-based):
- CARDIOSPONDYLOCARPOFACIAL SYNDROME (OMIM: 157800, Score: 0.854)
- SPONDYLOEPIMETAPHYSEAL DYSPLASIA, GUO-CAMPEAU TYPE (OMIM: 620663, Score: 0.846)
- BURATTI-HAREL SYNDROME (OMIM: 619314, Score: 0.845)
- HENNEKAM LYMPHANGIECTASIA-LYMPHEDEMA SYNDROME 1 (OMIM: 235510, Score: 0.842)
- CONGENITAL HYPOTONIA, EPILEPSY, DEVELOPMENTAL DELAY, AND DIGITAL ANOMALIES (OMIM: 618494, Score: 0.842)

III. Supporting Literature
Web Search Results (Literature/Case Reports):
- Title: Proptosis (Concept Id: C0015300) - MedGen - NCBI
  Snippet: The provided text appears to be a fragment and does not provide sufficient context or information to determine if it is medically related or to create a structured summary. Please provide the full article or additional context for me to proceed.
- Title: Downslanted palpebral fissures (Concept Id: C0423110) - MedGen
  Snippet: The provided text is incomplete and does not contain sufficient information to create a structured summary. Please provide the full article or additional details for me to proceed.
